database.name: VIEW C_DEBT_PAYMENT_GENERATE
database.view: SELECT c_debt_payment_id, ad_client_id, ad_org_id, isactive, created, createdby, updated, updatedby, isreceipt, c_settlement_generate_id AS c_settlement_id, description, c_invoice_id, c_bpartner_id, c_currency_id, c_cashline_id, c_bankstatementline_id, c_bankaccount_id, c_cashbook_id, paymentrule, ispaid, amount, writeoffamt, dateplanned, ismanual, isvalid, generate_processed, glitemamt, c_settlement_cancel_id, c_glitem_id, isdirectposting, status_initial AS status, c_project_id, c_withholding_id, withholdingamount FROM c_debt_payment WHERE c_settlement_generate_id IS NOT NULL
